lookingpositive.lookingpositive

Class Calendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • lookingpositive.lookingpositive.Calendar

  • public final class Calendar
extends Object
    This class handles the storing of users' events.

        Parameters:

        oldDate - the date that the previews user had signed in
